translations: 州长的；统治者的；地方长官的；总督的

sentences.sentence: Next year there will be gubernatorial elections in 37 states.
sentences.translation: 明年将有37个州举行州长竞选。

sentences.sentence: It also hopes to make gains in six gubernatorial elections to be held on the same day.
sentences.translation: 国家行动党同样希望可以在同日举行的六次州长选举中获利。

sentences.sentence: He is the best known gubernatorial candidate and has raised far more money than all his opponents combined.
sentences.translation: 他是最知名的参选者，筹集到的竞选资金比所有竞争对手总和还多。
